title: Watermelon-tomato And Arugula Salad
summary: The recipe Watermelon-tomato And Arugula Salad could satisfy your Mediterranean craving in approximately 45 minutes. For $1.98 per serving, this recipe covers 11% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. Watching your figure? This gluten free, primal, and vegetarian recipe has 142 calories, 7g of protein, and 6g of fat per serving. This recipe serves 4. 32 people were glad they tried this recipe. Head to the store and pick up arugula leaves, balsamic vinegar, watermelon cubes, and a few other things to make it today. A couple people really liked this side dish. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 76%. This score is solid. Similar recipes include Arugula & Watermelon Salad, Watermelon Arugula Salad, and Watermelon-Arugula Salad.

winePairing.pairingText: Italian works really well with Chianti, Trebbiano, and Verdicchio. Italians know food and they know wine. Trebbiano and Verdicchio are Italian white wines that pair well with fish and white meat, while Chianti is a great Italian red for heavier, bolder dishes. The Piccini Chianti Classico with a 4.6 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 10 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Piccini Chianti Classico
productMatches.description: Bright ruby with a hint of purple. Plum, violet notes mix with lush, ripe wild berries. Expansive and alive on the palate, with a lingering, velvety mouth feel. The long finish is buried in fruit.A versatile wine, best served at 64ÂºF, fantastic with juicy red meats, grilled or roasted.
